summary: All previously reported issues have been addressed with appropriate fixes and no new blocking problems were introduced.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Tier parsing accepts non-integer values and duplicates parsing logic
previous_issues_status.notes: A shared parseTier helper now enforces integer-only tiers and is used consistently.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Missing validation for pool configuration leading to incomplete/incorrect embed data
previous_issues_status.notes: Pool configuration is now checked and returns a clear error if missing.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Model aliases displayed without anti-narration sanitization and could throw if undefined
previous_issues_status.notes: Aliases are now guarded and sanitized before display.
